Name: Halloween Knight
About the game: Halloween Knight is a hack n' slash adventure game mixed with tower defenses where you try to protect your house on Halloween night. You can switch between melee, ranged, and magical attacks on the fly while you battle against the hordes of monsters attacking your house and you. DON'T BUY THIS GAME. I'm working on an update and revamping just about everything.
